items.name: TNT
items.description: A great tool for demolition peko.

items.name: Fishing pole
items.description: A good old fishing pole for poor villager to surviving other day, not that great but trustworthy nonetheless

items.name: Hunting rifle
items.description: The rifle that is mean for taking down a deer, can be overkill for taking down a rabbit, mind you.

items.name: Rabbit
items.description: A cute creature that definitely not Pekora, can feed a man a day of hard work and can be sold for a good price

items.name: Smartphone
items.description: A typical smartphone that people always use. You can play gacha game on it.

items.name: Copper Carrot
items.description: Carrot which is made out of Copper...why?

items.name: Silver Carrot
items.description: What make a carrot better is make it from silver, isn't that great idea?

items.name: Golden Carrot
items.description: Ah, shiny! Pekora might be jealous of you!
